# {{n-g|used in French overseas territories and departments to designate people coming from [[metropolitan France]]}}
types.html:
zoreille m or f by sense (plural zoreilles)

  1. used in French overseas territories and departments to designate people coming from metropolitan France
trans: used in French overseas territories and departments to designate people coming from metropolitan France
